title: Forum level not reflecting in-game level
body:
I was going to post about this last year, but most of the boards were locked to level 7 or higher, and I somehow couldn't find my way here (Looking at it again, I went to _Report A Bug_)...
In game, I am level 23 right now. According to the forums, I am level 1, and so I can't post anything on most of the boards.
Here are screenshot proofs of both:
[Imgur album.](http://imgur.com/a/qof0a)

Are the levels separate, or is it improperly linked, or what? It's certainly the same account; when I click on the "Match History" button, it does indeed show my recent games, not to mention the Summoner Icons match up.

replies.body:
Upon posting here on the boards, your Boards and Summoner profiles are forced to sync. I see you as level 23 on your discussion post, so it looks like this fixed the issue!

Happy posting!
